meanings.definition: The state or quality of being two in number.
meanings.sent1: The twoness of the pair of socks made them easy to match.
meanings.sent2: I love the twoness of twins, they always have a special bond.
meanings.sent3: The twoness of the two peas in a pod always made them inseparable.
meanings.sent4: The twoness of the moon and the sun symbolizes balance in nature.
meanings.sent5: The twoness of the eyes allows us to perceive depth and distance.

meanings.definition: The concept or idea of duality or division into two parts.
meanings.sent1: The twoness of yin and yang represents the balance of opposites.
meanings.sent2: In literature, the twoness of good and evil is a common theme.
meanings.sent3: The twoness of chocolate and vanilla ice cream creates a delicious dilemma.
meanings.sent4: The twoness of day and night reminds us of the cycle of life.
meanings.sent5: The twoness of black and white photography captures the essence of simplicity.
